_A_SELECT_STYLE_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: Component for selecting styles from a predefined set of styles
_A_SELECT_STYLE_GROUP_DATA_EXTENDED_DESC: Extended data allows adding additional styles to the component
_A_SELECT_STYLE_GROUP_FILTER_GROUPS_DESC: Group filtering allows displaying only specific style groups
_A_SELECT_STYLE_PROPS_DATA_EXTENDED_DESC: Array of objects with additional styles for the component
_A_SELECT_STYLE_PROPS_FILTER_GROUPS_DESC: Array or object for filtering style groups
_A_SELECT_STYLE_PROPS_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_: Component type: select, selectStyle, multiselect, multiselectStyle
